title: Schizophrenia sufferer mistakes smart fridge ad for psychotic episode
author: hliyan
aiHeadline: Woman with schizophrenia mistakes smart fridge ad for a hallucination, proving that some tech is just too advanced for its own good.

title: GrapheneOS is the only Android OS providing full security patches
author: akyuu
aiHeadline: GrapheneOS is the only Android OS that actually gives a damn about your security, unlike all the others that just let you get hacked.

title: How I discovered a hidden microphone on a Chinese NanoKVM
author: ementally
aiHeadline: Some guy finds a hidden microphone in his Chinese NanoKVM, proving that even your keyboard is spying on you now.

title: Tiny Core Linux: a 23 MB Linux distro with graphical desktop
author: LorenDB
aiHeadline: Linux geeks rejoice! Tiny Core Linux is so small it might disappear if you blink, but it still manages to have a graphical desktop.
